objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1E1E1E;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#3A3A3A;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#646464;stop-opacity:0.8' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#383838;stop-opacity:0.6' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='300' fill='url(#accentGrad)' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='250' fill='url(#accentGrad)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,300 C180,250 360,350 540,300 C720,250 900,350 1080,300 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#242424' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,600 C180,550 360,650 540,600 C720,550 900,650 1080,600 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#2D2D2D' opacity='0.7'/></svg>

product_details.name: Pro-Grade Studio Headphones | Premium Comfort Over-Ear Audio Experience
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade audio drivers for crystal clear sound reproduction
• Plush memory foam ear cushions for extended comfort during long sessions
• Adjustable padded headband for custom fit and durability
• Closed-back design for superior noise isolation
• Heavy-duty wired connection for reliable, uninterrupted audio
• Sophisticated matte black finish with premium build quality
• Ergonomic ear cup design for optimal sound positioning
• Foldable design for easy storage and portability
• Studio-quality sound profile ideal for mixing, monitoring, and casual listening
• Deep, cushioned ear pads prevent ear fatigue during extended use

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern design aimed at promoting a high-end audio product. The background is a dark, abstract wavy gradient with layered vector elements and soft circular patterns, adding depth and an elegant tech-inspired look. At the top, text element `heading` prominently displays the brand or product name in a bold, futuristic font. Below it, text element `subheading` emphasizes the product type in lighter gray tones. The central focus is a realistic image of headphones (`product_image`), well-positioned to draw attention. Below the image, the `price` text stands out in large, bold white font, and beneath it, a call-to-action button is formed using a dark rectangular shape (`cta_background`) and accompanying `cta` text encouraging immediate action. 

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#1E1E1E` (Primary background gradient start)
- Charcoal Gray: `#3A3A3A` (Primary background gradient end)
- Ash Gray: `#646464` (Gradient accent)
- Cool Gray: `#4F4F4F` (Call-to-action button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Headings, CTA, and price text)
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0` (Subheading text)
product_color: The product features a sleek, professional design primarily using shades of dark gray and black, giving it a modern, high-tech appeal. The matte and glossy textures are subtly blended on the ear cups and headband, allowing light to naturally highlight edges and curves for visual depth. This contrast subtly emphasizes its premium materials. Ideal banner palette includes: Charcoal #2B2B2B, Graphite Gray #4F4F4F, Steel Gray #7C7C7C, and Silver #A9A9A9. The minimalist colors along with distinct highlights and shadows project durability and elegance, making it suitable for a tech-savvy audience and high-end audio product marketing.
